hooks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "[Console]::InputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8; $json = [Console]::In.ReadToEnd(); $data = $json | ConvertFrom-Json; $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $prompt = $data.prompt; $logPath = 'Report/Logs/prompt_log.md'; if (-not (Test-Path 'Report/Logs')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'Report/Logs' -Force | Out-Null }; $content = \"---`r`n### $timestamp`r`n$prompt`r`n`r`n\"; [System.IO.File]::AppendAllText($logPath, $content, [System.Text.UTF8Encoding]::new($false))"
